solution_line_template: Nathan played a total of {air_hockey_games} air hockey + {basketball_games} basketball = <<{air_hockey_games}+{basketball_games}={total_games}>>{total_games} games.
This cost him {total_games} games x {cost_per_game} tokens each = <<{total_games}*{cost_per_game}={total_tokens}>>{total_tokens} tokens.
